articles.author: Srinivas Mazumdaru
articles.title: US appeals court blocks ruling returning VOA staff to work - DW
articles.description: A federal appeals court ruled against allowing Voice of America (VOA) employees to return to work, throwing the broadcaster's future into disarray.
articles.content:
A federal appeals court on Saturday blocked a ruling that had ordered the Trump administration to allow Voice of America (VOA) to go back on air.
The publicly funded broadcaster fell silent in March… [+1760 chars]
